description: Try our easy to follow Carrot & Walnut Muffins recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Carrot & Walnut Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, to make the topping, beat butter and sugar together with electric beaters for 5 minutes or until pale and creamy. Add cream cheese and beat until combined. Spread over muffins. Decorate with extra walnuts.
